\nConnect to HashiCorp Vault to securely:
Connect to HashiCorp Vault to securely manage secrets.

**Authentication Methods:**
- **Token**: Use a Vault token directly
- **AppRole**: Use Role ID and Secret ID for machine authentication
Read a secret from HashiCorp Vault: 从HashiCorp 密码库读取一个密钥
Write a secret to HashiCorp Vault: 将一个秘密写入HashiCorp 保险库
Delete a secret from HashiCorp Vault: 从HashiCorp 密码库中删除一个密钥
List secrets at a path in HashiCorp Vaul: 在HashiCorp 密码库的路径上列出密钥
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
The name of the secrets engine (mount pa: 机密引擎的名称 (挂载路径)
Version of the secret to read (0 for lat: 要读取的密钥版本 (0表示最新的 KV v2)
The secret data to store as JSON: 存储为 JSON 的秘密数据
The path to the secret to delete (e.g.,: 要删除的密钥路径(例如myapp/database)
The path to list secrets from (e.g., mya: 列出秘密的路径 (例如, myapp/)
